ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] The boat to Kunark
ygData.msgSnippet: That is like the worst thing that can happen is to fall off a boat into the water in the middle of the ocean and not be able to gate out. I used to do that all
ygData.messageBody:
That is like the worst thing that can happen is to fall off a boat into the water in the middle of the ocean and not be able to gate out. I used to do that all the time when I first started playing but I was playing an enchanter and so could gate out.
----- Original Message -----
From: Su
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, July 13, 2002 1:21 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] The boat to Kunark


My brother had the problem that when the shuttles bumped together or one
passed through the other, it just knocked him into the water in TD. he
couldn't zone back out, he swam and swam but couldn't find land. He
petitioned bc he couldn't gate (he's a paladin). A GM answered the petition
but ported him to the evil docks where he was immediately killed. When he
tried to recontact the GM, she'd already logged off. He had to wait 3 hours
for a customer service rez and a port to the correct docks.
So, if you do get stuck, make sure you specify which docks you need to go
to.
luv,
-Su


> Uh oh.
> This does not sound good since you are not on Druzzil
> Ro, if I remember correctly and I had the same problem
> on that server.
>
> I heard you can petition and a GM will port you there
>
> I ended up going to oasis and going that way.
> it is trickier since in the overthere good races are
> KOS but I managed to jump off that boat and swim to
> the shore.  I did not manage to get through the other
> zones though.
>
> Good luck
>
> --- mlockridge01 <MLockridge01@...> wrote:
> > The other day I decided that a trip to Kunark was in
> > order for my
> > druid. I will be needing Brute hides, and so was
> > ready to go and hunt
> > them. However, the shuttles in Butcherblock never
> > met the boat. I
> > tried three times, three different shuttles, and
> > they went out to
> > Timerous Deep, got close to the boat, then the boat
> > left. The
> > shuttles just went back to BB.
> >
> > That avenue being out, I returned to SK to pick off
> > gnolls, and
> > forage Plains Pebbles. I almost have my bank tool
> > box full of them.
> > have about eight to go. So, decided to stay there
> > until I get the
> > rest.
> >
> > Plus I have been getting fs weapons from the gnolls,
> > which I have
> > tried to make into another Vale Sewing Kit to sell.
> >
> > Hope they get the boat fixed. For my first trip I
> > want to do it the
> > old-fashioned way.
> >
> > Barto Proudfoot
> >
> >
>
>
